:::{.def}

Here is a list of resources to get started with Emacs.

:::

### Internal documentation

You can access Emacs internal documentation with the following kbds:

- `C-h r`: Emacs manual
- `C-h t`: Emacs tutorial
- `C-h i`: Emacs info directory
- `C-h k`: info on kbd
- `C-h f`: info on function (command)
- `C-h v`: info on variable
- `C-h a`: info on command matching regexp
